com.joliciel.talismane.utils

Interface ObjectCache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleObjectCache

    public interface ObjectCache
    A cache for storing objects so they don't have to be reloaded multiple times from a datastore.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearCache()
      Clear all entities out of the cache.
      void clearCache(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Object> clazz)
      Clear all entities out of the cache corresponding to a particular Class only.
      <T> T getEntity(java.lang.Class<T> clazz, java.lang.Object id)
      Retrieve from the cache the entity corresponding to a given Class and id.
      <T> T getOrPutEntity(java.lang.Class<T> clazz, java.lang.Object id, T entity)
      If the Class and id provided already have an entity in the cache, return it, otherwise put the entity provided in the cache and return it.
      <T> void putEntity(java.lang.Class<T> clazz, java.lang.Object id, T entity)
      Put the entity in the cache corresponding to a given Class and id.
      <T> void removeEntity(java.lang.Class<T> clazz, java.lang.Object id)
      Remove the entity from the cache corresponding to a given Class and id.

    • Method Detail

      • getEntity

        <T> T getEntity(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                java.lang.Object id)
        Retrieve from the cache the entity corresponding to a given Class and id.
        Returns:
        the entity if in the cache, or null otherwise.

      • putEntity

        <T> void putEntity(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                   java.lang.Object id,
                   T entity)
        Put the entity in the cache corresponding to a given Class and id.

      • removeEntity

        <T> void removeEntity(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                      java.lang.Object id)
        Remove the entity from the cache corresponding to a given Class and id.

      • getOrPutEntity

        <T> T getOrPutEntity(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                     java.lang.Object id,
                     T entity)
        If the Class and id provided already have an entity in the cache, return it, otherwise put the entity provided in the cache and return it.

      • clearCache

        void clearCache()
        Clear all entities out of the cache.

      • clearCache

        void clearCache(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Object> clazz)
        Clear all entities out of the cache corresponding to a particular Class only.
